description: Detects usage of the "Add-WindowsCapability" cmdlet to add Windows capabilities. Notable capabilities could be "OpenSSH" and others.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Legitimate usage of the capabilities by administrators or users. Add additional filters accordingly.
name: Add Windows Capability Via PowerShell Cmdlet
query: (((process.executable.text:("*\\powershell.exe" OR "*\\pwsh.exe")) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("PowerShell.EXE" OR "pwsh.dll"))) AND process.command_line.text:"*Add\-WindowsCapability*" AND process.command_line.text:"*OpenSSH.*")
